title: BANANA, RAISIN AND YOGHURT FLAPJACKS
directions: Put the raisins (or any dried fruit of your choosing) in a blender and blitz into a paste, loosening with a little water if necessary.
Put the oats, banana and yoghurt in a bowl, mix together and then add the raisin mixture.
Mix well and turn out into a lined, greased baking tray, pressing down with a spatula until evenly spread.
Bake at 190°C, 375°F, Gas Mark 5 for 15-20 minutes.
Cut into 9 squares while still warm and store in an airtight tin.
